snippet.title: Run Gun Robots  - Gameplay - Construct 3 Game
snippet.description:
A short gameplay video of my last HTML 5 Game made in Construct 3
You can play it at:
https://www.gamearter.com/game/run-gun-robots/

Run Gun Robots is a run and gun game, where you have to jump from building to building destroying aggressive robots and avoiding deadly traps. Earn money buy defeating enemies and buy new powerups to to better address this new threat.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pitigamedev/
Ko-fi:  https://ko-fi.com/pierpaolotausani
My Games: https://pitigamedev.itch.io/
ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/pierpaolo87
